meanings.definition: A protective covering of organic material placed around plants to retain moisture, suppress weeds, and regulate soil temperature.
meanings.sent1: The gardener spread mulch around the flowers to keep the soil moist.
meanings.sent2: I bought some mulch to put in my garden to help my plants grow better.
meanings.sent3: Why did the soil go to the spa? To get a relaxing mulch treatment!
meanings.sent4: The mulch was like a cozy blanket for the plants, keeping them warm and happy.
meanings.sent5: The mulch acted like a shield, protecting the delicate roots from the harsh sun.

meanings.definition: To cover or surround with mulch.
meanings.sent1: She decided to mulch her garden to keep the soil healthy.
meanings.sent2: I will mulch the tree to help it grow strong and tall.
meanings.sent3: Why did the gardener bring a pillow to the garden? To mulch the plants to sleep!
meanings.sent4: The mulch wrapped around the plant like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: He mulched the garden with care, ensuring each plant was protected and nourished.
